ya10.3.4:5.1: ⇒ Yo cakkhundriyaṃ parijānāti so domanassindriyaṃ pajahitthāti?
ya10.3.4:6.1: ⇐ Yo vā pana domanassindriyaṃ pajahittha so cakkhundriyaṃ parijānātīti?
ya10.3.4:7.1: Dve puggalā domanassindriyaṃ pajahittha, no ca cakkhundriyaṃ parijānanti.
ya10.3.4:8.1: ⇒ Yo cakkhundriyaṃ parijānāti so anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ bhāvitthāti?
ya10.3.4:9.1: ⇐ Yo vā pana anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ bhāvittha so cakkhundriyaṃ parijānātīti?
ya10.3.4:10.1: Cha puggalā anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ bhāvittha, no ca cakkhundriyaṃ parijānanti.
ya10.3.4:11.1: ⇒ Yo cakkhundriyaṃ parijānāti so aññindriyaṃ bhāvitthāti?
ya10.3.4:12.1: ⇐ Yo vā pana aññindriyaṃ bhāvittha so cakkhundriyaṃ parijānātīti?
ya10.3.4:13.1: ⇒ Yo cakkhundriyaṃ parijānāti so aññātāvindriyaṃ sacchikaritthāti?
ya10.3.4:14.1: ⇐ Yo vā pana aññātāvindriyaṃ sacchikarittha so cakkhundriyaṃ parijānātīti?
ya10.3.4:15.1: ⇒ Yo domanassindriyaṃ pajahati so anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ bhāvitthāti?
ya10.3.4:16.1: ⇐ Yo vā pana anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ bhāvittha so domanassindriyaṃ pajahatīti?
ya10.3.4:17.1: Cha puggalā anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ bhāvittha, no ca domanassindriyaṃ pajahanti.
ya10.3.4:18.1: ⇒ Yo domanassindriyaṃ pajahati so aññindriyaṃ bhāvitthāti?
ya10.3.4:19.1: ⇐ Yo vā pana aññindriyaṃ bhāvittha so domanassindriyaṃ pajahatīti?
ya10.3.4:20.1: ⇒ Yo domanassindriyaṃ pajahati so aññātāvindriyaṃ sacchikaritthāti?
ya10.3.4:21.1: ⇐ Yo vā pana aññātāvindriyaṃ sacchikarittha so domanassindriyaṃ pajahatīti?
ya10.3.4:22.1: ⇒ Yo anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ bhāveti so aññindriyaṃ bhāvitthāti?
ya10.3.4:23.1: ⇐ Yo vā pana aññindriyaṃ bhāvittha so anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ bhāvetīti?
ya10.3.4:24.1: ⇒ Yo anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ bhāveti so aññātāvindriyaṃ sacchikaritthāti?
ya10.3.4:25.1: ⇐ Yo vā pana aññātāvindriyaṃ sacchikarittha so anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ bhāvetīti?
ya10.3.4:26.1: ⇒ Yo aññindriyaṃ bhāveti so aññātāvindriyaṃ sacchikaritthāti?
ya10.3.4:27.1: ⇐ Yo vā pana aññātāvindriyaṃ sacchikarittha so aññindriyaṃ bhāvetīti?
ya10.3.4:29.1: ⇒ Yo cakkhundriyaṃ na parijānāti so domanassindriyaṃ nappajahitthāti?
ya10.3.4:30.1: Dve puggalā cakkhundriyaṃ na parijānanti, no ca domanassindriyaṃ nappajahittha.
ya10.3.4:30.2: Cha puggalā cakkhundriyañca na parijānanti domanassindriyañca nappajahittha.
ya10.3.4:31.1: ⇐ Yo vā pana domanassindriyaṃ nappajahittha so cakkhundriyaṃ na parijānātīti?
ya10.3.4:32.1: ⇒ Yo cakkhundriyaṃ na parijānāti so anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ na bhāvitthāti?
ya10.3.4:33.1: Cha puggalā cakkhundriyaṃ na parijānanti, no ca anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ na bhāvittha.
ya10.3.4:33.2: Dve puggalā cakkhundriyañca na parijānanti anaññātaññassāmītindriyañca na bhāvittha.
ya10.3.4:34.1: ⇐ Yo vā pana anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ na bhāvittha so cakkhundriyaṃ na parijānātīti?
ya10.3.4:35.1: ⇒ Yo cakkhundriyaṃ na parijānāti so aññindriyaṃ na bhāvitthāti?
ya10.3.4:36.1: Arahā cakkhundriyaṃ na parijānāti, no ca aññindriyaṃ na bhāvittha.
ya10.3.4:36.2: Satta puggalā cakkhundriyañca na parijānanti aññindriyañca na bhāvittha.
ya10.3.4:37.1: ⇐ Yo vā pana aññindriyaṃ na bhāvittha so cakkhundriyaṃ na parijānātīti?
ya10.3.4:38.1: Aggamaggasamaṅgī aññindriyaṃ na bhāvittha, no ca cakkhundriyaṃ na parijānāti.
ya10.3.4:38.2: Satta puggalā aññindriyañca na bhāvittha cakkhundriyañca na parijānanti.
ya10.3.4:39.1: ⇒ Yo cakkhundriyaṃ na parijānāti so aññātāvindriyaṃ na sacchikaritthāti?
ya10.3.4:40.1: Arahā cakkhundriyaṃ na parijānāti, no ca aññātāvindriyaṃ na sacchikarittha.
ya10.3.4:40.2: Aṭṭha puggalā cakkhundriyañca na parijānanti aññātāvindriyañca na sacchikarittha.
ya10.3.4:41.1: ⇐ Yo vā pana aññātāvindriyaṃ na sacchikarittha so cakkhundriyaṃ na parijānātīti?
ya10.3.4:42.1: Aggamaggasamaṅgī aññātāvindriyaṃ na sacchikarittha, no ca cakkhundriyaṃ na parijānāti.
ya10.3.4:42.2: Aṭṭha puggalā aññātāvindriyañca na sacchikarittha cakkhundriyañca na parijānanti.
ya10.3.4:43.1: ⇒ Yo domanassindriyaṃ nappajahati so anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ na bhāvitthāti?
ya10.3.4:44.1: Cha puggalā domanassindriyaṃ nappajahanti, no ca anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ na bhāvittha.
ya10.3.4:44.2: Dve puggalā domanassindriyañca nappajahanti anaññātaññassāmītindriyañca na bhāvittha.
ya10.3.4:45.1: ⇐ Yo vā pana anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ na bhāvittha so domanassindriyaṃ nappajahatīti?
ya10.3.4:46.1: ⇒ Yo domanassindriyaṃ nappajahati so aññindriyaṃ na bhāvitthāti?
ya10.3.4:47.1: Arahā domanassindriyaṃ nappajahati, no ca aññindriyaṃ na bhāvittha.
ya10.3.4:47.2: Satta puggalā domanassindriyañca nappajahanti aññindriyañca na bhāvittha.
ya10.3.4:48.1: ⇐ Yo vā pana aññindriyaṃ na bhāvittha so domanassindriyaṃ nappajahatīti?
ya10.3.4:49.1: Anāgāmimaggasamaṅgī aññindriyaṃ na bhāvittha, no ca domanassindriyaṃ nappajahati.
ya10.3.4:49.2: Satta puggalā aññindriyañca na bhāvittha domanassindriyañca nappajahanti.
ya10.3.4:50.1: ⇒ Yo domanassindriyaṃ nappajahati so aññātāvindriyaṃ na sacchikaritthāti?
ya10.3.4:51.1: Arahā domanassindriyaṃ nappajahati, no ca aññātāvindriyaṃ na sacchikarittha.
ya10.3.4:51.2: Aṭṭha puggalā domanassindriyañca nappajahanti aññātāvindriyañca na sacchikarittha.
ya10.3.4:52.1: ⇐ Yo vā pana aññātāvindriyaṃ na sacchikarittha so domanassindriyaṃ nappajahatīti?
ya10.3.4:53.1: Anāgāmimaggasamaṅgī aññātāvindriyaṃ na sacchikarittha, no ca domanassindriyaṃ nappajahati.
ya10.3.4:53.2: Aṭṭha puggalā aññātāvindriyañca na sacchikarittha domanassindriyañca nappajahanti.
ya10.3.4:54.1: ⇒ Yo anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ na bhāveti so aññindriyaṃ na bhāvitthāti?
ya10.3.4:55.1: Arahā anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ na bhāveti, no ca aññindriyaṃ na bhāvittha.
ya10.3.4:55.2: Satta puggalā anaññātaññassāmītindriyañca na bhāventi aññindriyañca na bhāvittha.
ya10.3.4:56.1: ⇐ Yo vā pana aññindriyaṃ na bhāvittha so anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ na bhāvetīti?
ya10.3.4:57.1: Aṭṭhamako aññindriyaṃ na bhāvittha, no ca anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ na bhāveti.
ya10.3.4:57.2: Satta puggalā aññindriyañca na bhāvittha anaññātaññassāmītindriyañca na bhāventi.
ya10.3.4:58.1: ⇒ Yo anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ na bhāveti so aññātāvindriyaṃ na sacchikaritthāti?
ya10.3.4:59.1: Arahā anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ na bhāveti, no ca aññātāvindriyaṃ na sacchikarittha.
ya10.3.4:59.2: Aṭṭha puggalā anaññātaññassāmītindriyañca na bhāventi aññātāvindriyañca na sacchikarittha.
ya10.3.4:60.1: ⇐ Yo vā pana aññātāvindriyaṃ na sacchikarittha so anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ na bhāvetīti?
ya10.3.4:61.1: Aṭṭhamako aññātāvindriyaṃ na sacchikarittha, no ca anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ na bhāveti.
ya10.3.4:61.2: Aṭṭha puggalā aññātāvindriyañca na sacchikarittha anaññātaññassāmītindriyañca na bhāventi.
ya10.3.4:62.1: ⇒ Yo aññindriyaṃ na bhāveti so aññātāvindriyaṃ na sacchikaritthāti?
ya10.3.4:63.1: Arahā aññindriyaṃ na bhāveti, no ca aññātāvindriyaṃ na sacchikarittha.
ya10.3.4:63.2: Cha puggalā aññindriyañca na bhāventi aññātāvindriyañca na sacchikarittha.
ya10.3.4:64.1: ⇐ Yo vā pana aññātāvindriyaṃ na sacchikarittha so aññindriyaṃ na bhāvetīti?
ya10.3.4:65.1: Tayo maggasamaṅgino aññātāvindriyaṃ na sacchikarittha, no ca aññindriyaṃ na bhāventi.
ya10.3.4:65.2: Cha puggalā aññātāvindriyañca na sacchikarittha aññindriyañca na bhāventi.
